statements: UPDATE ConversationalData SET message='Hello, World!' WHERE message_id = 1;
UPDATE ConversationalData SET user_id=2, timestamp='2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE message_id = 2;
UPDATE ConversationalData SET message = 'Hello, how are you?' WHERE user_id = 123 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
UPDATE ConversationalData SET timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, message = 'Nice to meet you!' WHERE message_id = 456;
UPDATE chatbot_conversations SET message = 'Hello, how can I assist you?' WHERE conversation_id = 1;
UPDATE chatbot_responses SET response_text = 'Sure, I can help with that.' WHERE bot_id = 2;
